Pre-Game Insights: The pick in this article is the opinion of the writer, not a PickDawgz site consensus.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is Game 2 in a best-of-seven ALCS series.
The game is at Yankee Stadium.
The game will be broadcast on TBS.
Others: Gerrit Cole will be the starting pitcher for the Yankees, and Tanner Bibee will start for the Guardians.
Cole hasn't had the most even campaign this year, but he came back to pitch well in the decisive Game 4 of the Division Series.
Bibee has given up two earned over 8.2 innings of work in his two postseason outings this year.
